p2: Aimed at fans of Fernando Alonso and Formula One in general, this is a test where you will be faced with text, images and even team radio-based questions, and you will have to identify the correct answer from among four options.
p3: At the moment there are only about 70 questions in total - the goal is to have a more extensive database. If you would like to contribute in any way, in addition to Github, you can contact us at:
p4: Ready? Then click the button to begin:
data_policy_1: When a GitHub Pages site is visited, the visitor's IP address is logged and stored for security purposes, regardless of whether the visitor has signed into GitHub or not.
data_policy_2: For more information about GitHub's security practices, see GitHub Privacy Statement.
share_msg2: of the questions on Fernando Alonso!
